item.title: The Last Hours: Jesus or Barabbas
item.description: The Last Hours: Jesus or Barabbas Bible Verses Matthew 27:11-26 Preacher John Smith Preached on April 20, 2019 Sermon description On Palm Sunday it’s only fitting to consider why Jesus came - not just to Jerusalem that day - but to our world in the first place. Simply put, he came as a Substitute - to take the place of sinners under God’s judgment.
